tool_description: Vybit (VIBE-it) sends personalized push notifications using sounds that you record or choose from thousands of searchable sounds. This API describes how to trigger a specific vyb notification.

api_list.name: Vyb POST trigger with notification payload
api_list.description: This API endpoint allows you to send a push notification with a specific payload. Note that notification parameters included in the post will override the default notification settings for the vyb.

required_parameters.name: key
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the notification trigger.
